extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected FLXEON Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if any FLXEON products are exposed directly to the Internet or are using default passwords.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are FLXEON products exposed directly to the Internet?

extracted_playbook.title: Disconnect Exposed FLXEON Products
extracted_playbook.description: Stop and disconnect any FLXEON products that are exposed directly to the Internet, either via a direct ISP connection or via NAT port forwarding.

extracted_playbook.title: Reconfigure Network for FLXEON Products
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure FLXEON systems operate behind a firewall and are accessed remotely using a secure VPN gateway.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FLXEON Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all FLXEON products are upgraded to the latest firmware version (9.3.5 or above).

extracted_playbook.title: Change Default Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Change default passwords on FLXEON products if they are still in use.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Physical Security Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that physical controls are in place to prevent unauthorized access to devices, components, peripheral equipment, and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure VPN Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the VPN gateway and network are set up in accordance with best industry standards and maintained with security patches for all related components.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
